name: Callie Crabtree
text: Seems they have cleaned the place up and food is good.   My little boy absolutely loves to eat here so he can play after.   Hopefully the games are better than they use to be.

name: Daniel Roop
text: Really good pizza on the buffet or as a sit down order. Fresh salad fixing on the buffet bar, along with pasta, pizza, and dessert items. Usually, they will even prepare your favorite pizza for the bar, if you ask. Plus, there’s a game room …More

name: Christie Sexton
text: My kids love the game room plus the bar is a big hit with them as well.  Friendly service, seat your self, love the salad bar as well.. Couldn't ask for nothing better, kids entertained and a full belly.. love watching the kids enjoy the games and having fun . Would recommend to young or old..

name: Thomas Evans
text: Relatively inexpensive. Food was okay. Lids enjoyed arcade

name: Wendell Steele
text: Great place when we came in they made new. Pizza for us .the salad bar was very fresh. Will go again.

name: Lisa Mason
text: We went for a birthday party. The food was good but the staff working there were even better. Nice experience

name: steven brown
text: Visited in the afternoon.  Very friendly staff and the pizza was fresh.  Great experience.

name: Charles Cupp
text: I sometimes go here for their lunch buffet. My previous reviews of this restaurant, would have gotten lower stars. However, this place has stepped up their game recently. I'm unsure whether or not it has changed owners, but the hard working …More

name: George Conner
text: There were only two people staffed and one of them had to go back and forth from the kitchen to the gaming area. My granddaughter dropped a plate of food but there wasn't a single trashcan in the entire restaurant. The cook had to come out …More

name: Patrick off grid
text: There buffet is great pull in customer there food is ether very good or very dry not sure why but it's been better last few times we have come down I would like to see there price come down little or do family dinner night with better …More

name: Debbie Lawson
text: Great pizza.Fresh salad.Will make any pizza you ask them to..

name: Philip Addington
text: Still a good pizza buffet. Gattiland is in need of a major overhaul. Would be much better for family gatherings.

name: Belinda Clem
text: $30 on kids eat free night for 6 people.  That isn't too bad of a price, but for Kids Eat Free night it was still dead and there was barely any choices for pizza.  Wish there was a Cici's Pizza close by, they are ten times better.

name: Kim Scalf
text: Wasnt crowded but the people working made sure we had fresh baked pizza and plenty of it.

name: Ben Cox
text: Great place to take the family. Great food, friendly staff and a game room for the kids.

name: Joe Lawson
text: Expensive if your not going to eat much otherwise it has come a long way on food quality over the last few years. The game room is never attended though so you have to waste a lot of time finding someone and waiting to be attended to if you want to cash out your child's tickets.

name: John Ashley
text: Love this place around here has wonderful Pizza all you can eat for one price whether it's Pizza spaghetti or whatever you need to give his place to Tri very clean very child-friendly come and check it out

name: Brittany Wallace
text: The salad bar was surprisingly fresh, and the pizza was great. Place was clean and not crowded at all.

name: ace bull
text: They have really cleaned the place up and so much more details in the way they make there food know you can't get no better. They are very friendly which goes a very long way with me stay that way that is what brings customers in when you want something special made they will make it for you like a special pizza.

name: Brittany Harrison
text: Great place to bring my family love it... it's small and not loud

name: Leah Robinson
text: They have the best food I've ever tasted!

name: JA Cassell
text: Delicious.  Friendly staff.    Parmesan not good.  Does not taste like cheese.  Too spicy hot.

name: Wayne Gilliam
text: This is our favorite place to eat. Very easy to just stop by

name: Andrew Shell
text: Salad bar was really good pizza and cheese sticks were delicious and smores pizza is the best dessert ive had at a buffet.

name: Kim Robinson
text: Great place for the family to have fun and get great food

name: Diane Hamm

name: David Hileman
text: Forty years after my first trip to Mr. Gatti's, it's still just as good!

name: Charles Profitt
text: Definately poor quality food. Far from its original quality when Bill and Deb Sloan owned it.

name: Shane Lyall
text: Stopped with the kids to play in the arcade. More broken games than working. It was so bad, I was embarrassed to keep asking for a refund when the games wouldn't function properly, or at all. We had already eaten so we didn't eat here but it smelled great at least.

name: Daniel Vanover
text: Always a great place to take the family.  Friendly staff and great buffet at a reasonable price.

name: Daniel Cress
text: Food was good but the games was not. Most of them broken or ate tokens

name: Jan Hays
text: Quiet and pleasant place to relax! No bright light. Tv's keep you engaged if you happen to be alone.

name: Kaye Hubbard

name: Sharon Mullins
